titlestmt.titleproper: Casa de Moneda de Chile mint assayers reports, 1772
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: Casa de Moneda de Chile mint assayers reports

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Three pages feature the ink stamped heading "un quartillo./SELLO QVARTO, UN QVART-/TILLO, AÑOS DE MIL SETE-/CIENTOS Y SETENTA, SE-/TENTA Y UNO" with Royal seal to the left. Bound in modern maroon full leather.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Casa de Moneda de Chile mint assayers documents, 1772, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Copyright
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.
